title: Of course Facebook and Google want to ‘solve’ social problems. They’re hungry for our data | Nathalie Olah
text: We hear it said all the time, most recently in a national campaign for BT: “Technology will save us.” The slogan was plastered on billboards across the country as part of BT’s new advertising campaign, linked to a “UK-wide digital skills movement” developed partly with Google.
